Sentencas: Performance improvement being a major need of the power sector aims at increasing efficiency, lowering air pollutants and ultimately cost.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: This paper explores a quadruple cycle, a hybrid of solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine, steam turbine and organic Rankine cycle totaling four cycles (SOFC-GT-ST-ORC), fueled primarily by natural gas for stationary power generation.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: A mathematical model of the configuration of the quadruple cycle is developed and the performance investigated through a parametric study of the thermodynamic components.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: The power output, efficiency and other results were validated with those found in literature.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: The quadruple cycle produced an efficiency of 66.1% with 1,1,1,2-tetrafluoroethane, R134a as the organic working fluid.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: This efficiency exceeded the performance of traditional thermodynamic cycles like single steam cycle, combined and triple cycle at similar operating conditions.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications

Sentencas: Lastly, the quadruple cycle presents a potential for optimization with waste heat recovery.
Titulo: Modeling of natural gas fueled quadruple cycle for power applications
